id.description: The ID of the profile to retrieve.

firstName.description: The first name of the profile.

lastName.description: The last name of the profile.

email.description: The email address of the profile.

receiveEmail.description: This is email marketing flag. Can be yes or no.

receiveEmailDate.description: The date on which email marketing consent was granted by the user.

GDPRProfileP13nConsentGranted.description: If user has given consent for his/her profile information to be used for personalization purposes.

GDPRProfileP13nConsentDate.description: The date on which GDPR personalization consent was granted by the user.

gender.description: The gender of the profile user.

dateOfBirth.description: The date of birth of the profile user.

daytimeTelephoneNumber.description: The phone Number of the profile.

shippingAddress.description: Default shipping address of the profile (Deprecated, please use 'shippingAddresses' instead).

dynamicProperties.description: Read-only list of dynamic properties associated with profile along with meta-data.

uiEditorType.description: The uiEditorType attribute of the dynamic property.

default.description: The default value of the dynamic property.

length.description: The length attribute of the dynamic property.

id.description: The ID of the dynamic property.

label.description: The label of the dynamic property.

type.description: The type of the dynamic property. Supported types are boolean, date, float, string, timestamp, enumerated, big string.

value.description: The value of the dynamic property.

required.description: The required attribute of the dynamic property.

roles.description: List of roles assigned to the profile.

catalog.description: The catalog associated with this profile.

repositoryId.description: RepositoryId of the catalog associated with this profile.

isTaxIncluded.description: Indicates whether prices are inclusive of tax

endDate.description: End date of the the associated list price list

listPriceList.description: The price list for list prices

active.description: indicates if the PriceListGroup is active

shippingSurchargePriceList.description: The price list for shipping surcharge prices

deleted.description: indicates if the PriceListGroup is deleted

repositoryId.description: The repository Id of the PriceListGroup item

salePriceList.description: The price list for sale prices

displayName.description: The display Name of the currency

repositoryId.description: The repository Id of the currency

fractionalDigits.description: The currency Code of the currency

currencyCode.description: The currency Code of the currency

numericCode.description: The numeric Code of the currency

id.description: The ID of the PriceListGroup item

includeAllProducts.description: If true, indicates that all the products in the catalog should have prices for activation of the PLG

startDate.description: Start date of the the associated list price list

taxCalculationType.description:
Indicates how tax calls are made based on the PriceListGroup setting. For a monetary PriceListGroup, the possible values are calculateTax and doNotCalculateTax.

For a point based PriceListGroup, the possible values are doNotCalculateTax, calculateTaxWithCurrencyConversion and calculateTaxWithoutCurrencyConversion.

isPointsBased.description: If true, indicates the PriceListGroup was created with a point based currency

status.description: status of Enrollment. It must be in any of 'RequestForEnrollment', 'Enrolled', 'RequestForUnenrollment', 'Unenrolled', 'Failed' states.

currentOrganization.description: current organization of the logged in b2b user.

derivedDunsNumber.description: The derivedDunsNumber attribute of user's current organization.

derivedTaxReferenceNumber.description: The derivedTaxReferenceNumber attribute of user's current organization.

organizationLogo.description: The relative path of user's current organization's logo.

description.description: The description of user's current organization.

delegateApprovalManagement.description: The delegateApprovalManagement of user's current organization.

derivedOrganizationLogo.description: The derivedOrganizationLogo attribute of user's current organization.

derivedUniqueId.description: The derivedUniqueId attribute of user's current organization.

derivedType.description: The derivedType attribute of user's current organization.

organizationLogoURL.description: The path of user's current organization's logo.

derivedVatReferenceNumber.description: The derivedVatReferenceNumber attribute of user's current organization.

repositoryId.description: The repositoryId of user's current organization.

name.description: The name of user's current organization.

derivedDescription.description: The derivedDescription attribute of user's current organization.

secondaryOrganizations.description: List of secondary organizations appended to the profile.

active.description: Status of the organization. It should be true or false

contactBillingAddress.description: Default billing address of the b2b profile.

phoneNumber.description: the phone Number of the address

companyName.description: the company name of the address

postalCode.description: the postal Code of the address
